Heading: Award
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) designed for presentation from a religious organization

Heading: Baby
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) designed to be a gift to commemorate a child’s birth

Heading: Bride
Note: A special gift Bible (or selected Biblical text) designed for the bride on her wedding day. Usually white

Heading: Confirmation
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) designed to be used in the confirmation reading or as a gift to a confirmand

Heading: Children’s
Note: A text Bible (or selected Biblical text) designed in presentation and readability for a child

Heading: Compact
Note: A small Bible (or selected Biblical text) with a trim height of five inches or less

Heading: Cross-reference
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) which includes text conveying cross-references to related scripture passages

Heading: Daily readings
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) laid out to provide readings for each day of the year

Heading: Devotional
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) containing devotional content together with the scripture

Heading: Family
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) containing family record pages and/or additional study material for family devotion

Heading: General/Text
Note: A standard Bible (or selected Biblical text) of any version with no distinguishing characteristics beyond the canonical text

Heading: Gift
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) designed for gift or presentation, often including a presentation page

Heading: Lectern/Pulpit
Note: A large Bible (or selected Biblical text) with large print designed for use in reading scriptures in public worship from either the pulpit or lectern

Heading: Men’s
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) especially designed with helps and study guides oriented to the adult male

Heading: Primary school
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) designed for use in primary school

Heading: Pew
Note: Usually inexpensive but sturdy, a Bible (or selected Biblical text) designed for use in church pews

Heading: Scholarly
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) including texts in Greek and/or Hebrew and designed for scholarly study

Heading: Student
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) with study articles and helps especially for use in the classroom

Heading: Study
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) with many extra features, e.g. book introductions, dictionary, concordance, references, maps, etc., to help readers better understand the scripture

Heading: Wedding gift
Note: A special gift Bible (or selected Biblical text) designed as a gift to the couple on their wedding day

Heading: Women’s
Note: A devotional or study Bible (or selected Biblical text) with helps targeted at the adult woman

Heading: Youth
Note: A Bible (or selected Biblical text) containing special study and devotional helps designed specifically for the needs of teenagers
